channel.title: Bingo Limiter?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Bingo Limiter?"

item.title: Re: Bingo Limiter?
item.content:encoded: Why one-shotting an enemy in a fight should result in 1 or 2 style points is beyond my understanding. Creating an item to allow people to pee on their oponents after they hit them in the face just enough not to drop them is then so stylish it gives you 50 points? Sounds like an item fix for a screwed up style point system to me.

item.title: Re: Bingo Limiter?
item.content:encoded: True. But I was having problems 1-shotting people while going for 200 style points.

item.title: Re: Bingo Limiter?
item.content:encoded:
There's a handful of us who do a little too much damage, but not quite enough. That is, we do too much, such that if we use a jutsu / don't use a gimping jutsu in round 1, we'll one shot the person we're fighting. However, if we use Epic Dog Urination Technique in the first round, we'll fall just short of killing the target. With Bingo Limiter, it'd let us hit EDUT a little more reliably.

Personally, I'm not currently ever planning on buying it.

item.title: Re: Bingo Limiter?
item.content:encoded:
Nope, the item Bingo Limiter says that you do less damage.

I have no idea. Unless there is some mission that wants you to go multiple rounds in a bingo to complete…

item.title: Re: Bingo Limiter?
item.content:encoded: Less damage when getting bingo am I right? Well after a period of battle their village comes up and helps them, and makes things harder.

item.title: Bingo Limiter?
item.content:encoded: Can someone explain why you would want to deal half damage?
